name: Mezcla
description: Mezcla Earrings. A mix of Spanish Baroque and clean Aztec style. Hand cast and sculpted in fine silver, oxidized, and hand buffed to a satin finish, and a lustrous shine for the triad embellishments. Handmade sterling silver ear wires. Approximately 1-3/8" (3.4 cm) in length. Cascada Collection These brilliant cascades of water and sunlight are a contemporary take on Aztec sun iconography. Each piece of Estúdio Davi jewelry is lovingly handmade to order; please allow 2-3 weeks from the date of your order for delivery. Your patience is appreciated!

name: Nuevo
description: Nuevo Earrings. A modern, geometric twist to the classic round style with a hint of sabor mesoamericano. Hand cast fine silver inlaid with matte polymer and buffed to a rich satin shine. Handmade sterling silver ear wires. Available in 3 colors (black, crimson, periwinkle). Approximately 1-1/4" (3.2 cm) in length. Flamenco Collection The fire and passion of Flamenco style are distilled into a polished, modernist aesthetic. Each piece of Estúdio Davi jewelry is lovingly handmade to order; please allow 2-3 weeks from the date of your order for delivery. Your patience is appreciated!
